full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD KYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034B CHOS @035A *, ,MNGON PA'I MDZOD KYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA, SLOB DPON SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DBYIG GNYEN GYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MI TRA DANG, ZHUN CHEN GYI LOTZTSA PA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, KUN MKHYEN DBYIG GNYEN PO'I GSUNG GSANG MDZOD, ,GZHI LNGA'I GNAS TSUL RAB GSAL NOR BU'I GTER, ,PHAN BDE'I SGO BRGYA YANGS POR PHYE BA'I SLAD, ,CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU, ,SDE BA RAB 'BYAMS PA DBANG LEGS GRUB DANG, ,DGE SLONG LHA MCHOG RDO RJE NGAL BA YIS, ,PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE BAS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO, ,ZAB RGYAS THEG MCHOG LAM BZANG MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,'DI NI GSER TOGS MKHAN ZUR YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
